Questions.Question: Which artistic duo created the 'Gates' installation in Central Park?
Questions.Explanation: Christo and Jeanne-Claude were the artists behind the 'Gates' installation in Central Park, New York City, in 2005.

Questions.Question: Who collaborated with Frida Kahlo on the 'Two Fridas' painting?
Questions.Explanation: Frida Kahlo collaborated with herself on the 'Two Fridas' painting, symbolizing her dual identity.

Questions.Question: Which duo created the 'The Umbrellas' installation in Japan and the USA?
Questions.Explanation: Christo and Jeanne-Claude were the artists behind 'The Umbrellas' installation in Japan and the USA in 1991.

Questions.Question: Who collaborated with Andy Warhol on the 'Marilyn Diptych' artwork?
Questions.Explanation: Andy Warhol collaborated with himself on the 'Marilyn Diptych' artwork, showcasing his iconic pop art style.

Questions.Question: Which duo created the 'Wrapped Reichstag' project in Berlin?
Questions.Explanation: Christo and Jeanne-Claude were the artists behind the 'Wrapped Reichstag' project in Berlin, Germany, in 1995.

Questions.Question: Who collaborated with Salvador Dalí on the 'The Persistence of Memory' painting?
Questions.Explanation: Salvador Dalí collaborated with himself on 'The Persistence of Memory' painting, showcasing his surrealistic style.

Questions.Question: Which duo created the 'The Gates of Hell' sculpture?
Questions.Explanation: Auguste Rodin and Camille Claudel collaborated on 'The Gates of Hell' sculpture, depicting scenes from Dante's Inferno.

Questions.Question: Who collaborated with Keith Haring on the 'Crack is Wack' mural?
Questions.Explanation: Keith Haring collaborated with himself on the 'Crack is Wack' mural, raising awareness about drug addiction.

Questions.Question: Which duo created the 'The Starry Night' painting?
Questions.TrueAnswer: Vincent van Gogh and Paul Gauguin
Questions.Explanation: Vincent van Gogh and Paul Gauguin had a collaborative relationship, but 'The Starry Night' was solely painted by van Gogh.

Questions.Question: Who collaborated with Jean-Michel Basquiat on the 'SAMO' graffiti tags?
Questions.Explanation: Jean-Michel Basquiat collaborated with himself on the 'SAMO' graffiti tags, gaining recognition in the art world.

Questions.Question: Which duo created the 'The Lovers' sculpture?
Questions.Explanation: René Magritte and Georgette Berger collaborated on 'The Lovers' sculpture, depicting a man and woman kissing with cloth covering their faces.

Questions.Question: Who collaborated with Yoko Ono on the 'Cut Piece' performance art?
Questions.Explanation: Yoko Ono collaborated with herself on the 'Cut Piece' performance art, exploring themes of vulnerability and trust.

Questions.Question: Which duo created the 'The Son of Man' painting?
Questions.Explanation: René Magritte and Georgette Berger collaborated on 'The Son of Man' painting, featuring a man with an apple obscuring his face.

Questions.Question: Who collaborated with Marina Abramović on the 'The Artist is Present' performance art?
Questions.Explanation: Marina Abramović collaborated with herself on 'The Artist is Present' performance art, engaging with the audience through prolonged eye contact.

Questions.Question: Which duo created the 'Guernica' painting?
Questions.Explanation: Pablo Picasso collaborated with Dora Maar, his partner at the time, on the 'Guernica' painting, depicting the horrors of war.

Questions.Question: Who collaborated with Gilbert Proesch on the 'Gilbert and George' art duo?
Questions.Explanation: George Passmore collaborated with Gilbert Proesch to form the art duo known as 'Gilbert and George'.

Questions.Question: Which duo created the 'The Kiss' sculpture?
Questions.Explanation: Auguste Rodin and Camille Claudel collaborated on 'The Kiss' sculpture, depicting a passionate embrace between two lovers.

Questions.Question: Who collaborated with Ai Weiwei on the 'Dropping a Han Dynasty Urn' artwork?
Questions.Explanation: Ai Weiwei collaborated with himself on the 'Dropping a Han Dynasty Urn' artwork, challenging notions of cultural heritage.

Questions.Question: Which duo created the 'Les Demoiselles d'Avignon' painting?
Questions.Explanation: Pablo Picasso and Georges Braque were pioneers of Cubism and collaborated on the 'Les Demoiselles d'Avignon' painting.

Questions.Question: Who collaborated with Ulay on the 'Rest Energy' performance art?
Questions.Explanation: Marina Abramović collaborated with Ulay on the 'Rest Energy' performance art, showcasing trust and balance.

Questions.Question: Which duo created the 'The Birth of Venus' painting?
Questions.Explanation: Sandro Botticelli and Filippino Lippi collaborated on 'The Birth of Venus' painting, depicting the goddess emerging from the sea.
